page.title: 20Malmesbury - Schools
page.content: There are{two Primary Schools}in {Malmesbury, St.Josephs Roman Catholic School with 90 children who come from a wide area surrounding the town and {Malmesbury Primary School}with 290 children serves the{Town, Milbourne, {Brokenborough, Foxley, Norton and {Corston.}The Catholic School is in the older buildings near the town centre and does not have it's own field. The Primary School Buildings are only 2 years old and include two halls and a large field.Most children walk to school but some come on special buses which also serve the Comprehensive. {Malmesbury Comprehensive}Catchment Area includes the town and all the surrounding villages. The children come from{11 Primary Schools}and go first to{Filands }before moving on to {Corn Gastons}in the third year. There are 1000 pupils and 60 teachers.
